about_the_game: This DLC replaces the static image of the waifu in the tower screen (main screen) with Live2D animated characters with nudity states.

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: General Mature Content.
This base game is not included any nudity content.
All character are over 18 year old.

detailed_description: This DLC replaces the static image of the waifu in the tower screen (main screen) with Live2D animated characters with nudity states.
name: Tower of Waifus - Hot Honey

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This DLC replaces the static image of the waifu in the tower screen (main screen) with Live2D animated characters with nudity states.
